docs.text:

docs.title: My Design Process
docs.text:
1. Discovery
  2. Understand client goals
  3. Concept Development
  4. Sketches, moodboards
  5. Execution
  6. Vector work, polishing
  7. Feedback + Delivery
  8. Two revision rounds
